channel.title: Moving Boxes on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Moving Boxes on My New Hugo Site

item.title: 4 Way Picture Box
item.description: Do you need to transport your art collection or a delicate antique mirror but the thought of breaking something gives you a headache? We can provide salvation! Our brand new Frame Moving Boxes are specifically designed to accommodate thin items such as paintings and mirrors, to make your life much easier when it comes to moving. These boxes are made of the highest quality material to guarantee optimum strength, lightness and comfort.

item.title: Book Box
item.description: Convenient moving boxes for small, heavy items. Order a few book boxes for those last minute items that need to be packed. Meets UPS and FedEx shipping requirements. Box dimensions: 12.5” x 12.5” x 16”

item.title: China Box
item.description: Need to transport items from the kitchen? Not a problem! Our cheap kitchen moving boxes are specially designed to help you carry things from your kitchen and dinner room. You don’t need to worry about the safety of your items as the moving boxes are made of strong, durable, corrugated cardboard so they are reliable enough to carry glasses, stemware, dishes and any other dinnerware. The kitchen boxes are of standard dimensions (18”x18”x27”) and are easy to carry but with plenty of room at the same time.

item.title: Commercial Bin
item.description: A Commercial Bin is a 48”x 24”x 28” container used for moving and storing miscellaneous items. Good For: Computers, Printers, Electronics, Pictures, Small Boxes, other miscellaneous items.

item.title: File Box
item.description: It goes without saying that moving to another place usually takes extra time and attention, especially when it comes to transporting your documents and important papers. We all know that it is very important to keep files safe and organized while moving. Remember how many times you couldn’t find your ID or your passport after moving to another place? We are pleased to relieve you from these worries as we offer you our special file moving boxes.

item.title: Lamp Box
item.description: Lamp box is ideal for moving, storing or shipping oddly shaped items such as lamps, golf clubs or telescopes.

item.title: Linen Box 3.0
item.description: Use these moving boxes for mid-weight items like toys, pots and pans and serving items.

item.title: Linen Box 4.5
item.description: Use these moving boxes for mid-weight items like toys, pots and pans and serving items.

item.title: Picture Box
item.description: Ideal for paintings, mirrors and any thin items. You can normally place two to three paintings, prints, or mirrors in each box.

item.title: Wardrobe Box 10.0
item.description: Our Wardrobe Boxes (24” x 24” x 40”) are made of extra strength 44 ECT corrugated packed in bundles of 3, 6, 9 and 12 wardrobe boxes. Each wardrobe box comes with a sturdy metal hanger bar so you can simply transfer items from you closet to the wardrobe box. You will appreciate it if you have a small elevator or no elevator at all. Good for people who do not have many clothes.

item.title: Wardrobe Box 15.0
item.description: Our Wardrobe Boxes (24” x 24” x 40”) are made of extra strength 44 ECT corrugated packed in bundles of 3, 6, 9 and 12 wardrobe boxes. Each wardrobe box comes with a sturdy metal hanger bar so you can simply transfer items from you closet to the wardrobe box. You will appreciate it if you have a small elevator or no elevator at all. Good for people who do not have many clothes.
